title: Note 1
description: If the universe has any purpose more important than topping a woman you love and making a baby with her hearty help, I have never heard of it.

title: Note 2
description: Anyone who cannot cope with mathematics is not fully human. At best he is a tolerable subhuman who has learned to wear shoes, bathe, and not make messes in the house.

title: Note 3
description: Cheops' Law: Nothing ever gets built on schedule or within budget.
